episodes.title: Continuing conversations with Anne Peterson, where is the exit?
episodes.description:
what I'm finding with the theme of this channel is that with the (so far) few people willing to speak about their lives AFTER participating in Landmark's Education, there is a sense of freedom in the room. I know for myself, once Chris Shelton gave me the space to talk, I couldn't stop.. and it's a bit like this with these conversations. There is a LOT to talk about, and by the same token there is a lot of information to take in for any listeners who might be researching whether or not to participate in the courses, programs, seminars... or god forbid, "leadership" programs offered by Landmark Education/Landmark Worldwide.

Accommodating these potential audiences has me take small steps into the lives of people in the room, and so we slowly slowly unravel this highly complex world to have it make sense for ourselves, and whoever tunes in.

Through these regular conversations with Anne Peterson, the author of "Is This A Cult", we confront the line between transformation and exploitation. It's a very fine one.

Today we talk about the exit, why it's important to know where that door is.. and the stepping stones Anne is building for those who can at least now see the sign.

We also spell out a few other interesting gems :)

Here's where you can buy Anne's book:
https://www.amazon.com.au/This-Cult-Confronting-Transformation-Exploitation/dp/B0CX8XFLWQ

episodes.title: Meet Riley Wilson, he was an introduction leader with Landmark Education
episodes.description:
... and... he has lived through 3 iterations of the Introduction Leaders program, which now no longer exists.

I was curious to learn about what Landmark's like now compared to back then, if anything's rrreeeeallly changed at all. 

What do you think?

episodes.title: conversations with Anne Peterson part 3
episodes.description:
Today we talked about the differences between the Wisdom Course and Landmark's what they call "Education".... and put forth some ideas about trauma within the Rosenberg family.

Given that there's a whole lot more to discuss, Anne and I have organised ourselves to upload one of these video's every two weeks, and I'm planning on the next one going live. If you're online at 7.30amAEDT please put the next one in your diary for Thursday 4July.

episodes.title: The conversation continues "Is This A Cult" author Anne Peterson shares more of her history
episodes.description:
I know, the title is Life AFTER Landmark... however there's a lot of background to uncover first, to truly grasp the intensity of having been involved with Landmark in the first place. We touch on why it could be that people are afraid to talk, well, that's what we intended and the dynamics of the conversation took us in a round about way of uncovering the reason.

Anne has a private Facebook group for anybody who would like to test the waters with their story. FB Group, and given the sensitive nature of the subject matter, she has guidelines: People must answer the questions and agree t group rules we are screening.  This group is primarily for ex-staff, leaders, assistants who are grappling to understand what happened and how to recover and heal. 

If you are on Facebook and would like to "talk" in an online forum setting, here is the link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/372327595646763/ 

Anne's interview with Chris Shelton is well worth listening to as well, she touches on some of the content in today's chat:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mFmJBxrgnsY&ab_channel=ChrisShelton%2CMSc 

We'll be sharing more of our experiences +/- every two weeks. If you're not subscribed already it might be a good idea.

episodes.title: First interview with an ex-staff person, meet "X"
episodes.description:
X prefers to keep the black screen up during this interview and she gives the reason for that, it's probably not what you're thinking! here she goes into detail about her life after Landmark and why she was drawn to the organisation - like a moth to a flame.

Now that the first one is done, I sense it's the first of many more, she has a lot to say.

episodes.title: Life After Landmark
episodes.description:
Hi, I'm Dale Dickins and I was "on staff" with Landmark Education and Landmark Education Corporation (when it transitioned). I was employed as Manager for the Assisting Program, Self Expression and Leadership registration, the Communication Curriculum I completed the Course Supervisor Program, was also the Participation Manager for (at the time) Australia's smallest "Centre" in Perth, Western Australia and I had a short stint as a Self Expression and Leadership Program Leader.

When I finally "completed" as a Staff person and left the company, I was left very confused and tormented for 18 years until I finally plucked up the courage to contact Chris Shelton who I'd been listening to regularly to make sense of my experience. Ex-Scientologists were speaking a language I understood and I soaked up all the information I could... astounded at the similarities. 

The ontological shift I've experienced since that interview is what has me create this channel. The intent is to create a (safe) space for people to speak, to realise they are not going crazy. Those questionable events did happen... and, Landmark is correct, airing what has been suppressed.... saying those things that can't be said... it really does work. 

If you have something to say about your experience with Landmark, please contact me, let's talk.
